review: according to me as I am a regular tobacco user got scaling done and also polishing followed by tooth removal...the very great hand experience...

tags: None
review: *** ***** ** ******* **** **** ******* ** ** *** * ****** ** ** * *** ********* When we first met him he told us 2500 for cleaning n filling the teeth n after that he ll do d require procedure but when I went next day for actual treatment first he didn't discuss any fee just started cleaning my teeth, after cleaning when he has to do d filling he stopped n ask me to discuss d fee....Then he said 1300 rs for each teeth n he has all shorts of warranty card for 5 years 10 year 15 yrs etc etc when I asked that yesterday u told me clearly that u will charge for all d teeth but he simply denied.******* *** ******** ** ** ***** * *** *** ** ********* *** **** **** * *** **** ***** ********* *** ** ***** ** *** *********  * *** *** * ******* ***** ** *** *********
reply_text:
Warranty card was all answered for your query to your question for zirconia crowns which you wanted to do which is really the practice to do so…those who have done any time in real life zirconia crowns all know this fact…
And for your query review yes I charge 2000 for a scaling and fillings were 750/1200/1500 & 2000 per tooth  each categories which you failed to answer…
On asking before proceeding to do the all treatments for your consent you diccouraged and quitted…
Highly sceptical….

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi
He has almost charged me double for cap. He showed there are multiple warranty *** *** *** ***** ** ******* **** **** ** Do not go on his sweet words and his scientific explanation.
For one zirconium cap of dent care he has charged me 14k, outside it will come for 7-9k. 
Plus he has done filling in other tooth saying this is very much required. These fillings came out in a month only. He will put blam e  on the patient only. 
Just today I got to know the court has asked to discontinue the warranty on cap.

** ****** *********  **** * ****** **** ** **** **** *** ********
Please think twice before visiting.
